name: When the Sixteenth Lamb Arrives
description:
When the Sixteenth Lamb Arrives

Join the tired Lamb on its journey through the dream and help the orphans sleep. Inspired by the Israeli children's book and Flappy Bird, this game challenges you to guide the lamb through a never-ending course of kids and ceiling lamps. But be careful - when the lamb touches real world objects, it perishes!
Will you bring comfort and rest to the orphaned children who need it most?

Controls:
Left mouse botton, space bar

Guidance:
Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

Art and Interaction course, Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
